## Properties

| Property  | Attribute | Description                                    | Type                                                                                                                                                                                                  | Default      |
| --------- | --------- | ---------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------ |
| `alt`     | `alt`     | Texte alternatif personnalisé                  | `string`                                                                                                                                                                                              | `undefined`  |
| `name`    | `name`    | Nom complet utilisé pour générer les initiales | `string`                                                                                                                                                                                              | `'Alex Doe'` |
| `size`    | `size`    | Taille du composant                            | `"lg" \| "md" \| "sm"`                                                                                                                                                                                | `'md'`       |
| `src`     | `src`     | URL de l’image                                 | `string`                                                                                                                                                                                              | `undefined`  |
| `status`  | `status`  | Statut affiché dans la pastille                | `"away" \| "busy" \| "none" \| "offline" \| "online"`                                                                                                                                                 | `'none'`     |
| `variant` | `variant` | Variante sémantique                            | `"accent" \| "accentSoft" \| "cherry" \| "cyan" \| "error" \| "indigo" \| "indigoAlt" \| "info" \| "neutralDark" \| "primary" \| "primaryLight" \| "secondary" \| "success" \| "warning" \| "yellow"` | `'primary'`  |
